channel.title: Forum hosting
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I would like to introduce something new that will help new servers out A LOT
I am offering free forum hosting
it would be something like www.rs-palace.com/YOURserver here With No-Ads At all!
if you want a shorter domain then just get a .co.nr domain
The requirements for this are: 1. 20+ people at an average online per a time
If you would like this service then please use this layout
[code] What is your forum name: What is your server:(link to it) Proof:(picture with people on showing your server name also and your name on the server) What is your MSN addy: [/code]
Thats all you have to do

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @xx_ch4d_xx xx_ch4d_xx
item.description:
@xx_ch4d_xx wrote:

I dont care about them? maybe i wanna help them?? and I already know about the free forum and site hosting, and you know what I’m not going to argue with you anymore, I am going to continue to offer my “free” service. Good bye.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Once again, why do you care about them?

And real hosting doesn’t HAVE to cost money. There are countless sites out there already that host forums and sites for free. Alternatively they could just set up their own webserver, its not the hardest thing in the world to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @xx_ch4d_xx xx_ch4d_xx
item.description:
@xx_ch4d_xx wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:4, topic:109082”]Why do you care? Thre are hundreds of servers out there, 90% are never up at any one time, and 80% don’t have more than 5 dedicated players. All the servers are the same.

And still, if they had a good server, the fact that they would go find real hosting can’t be denied.[/quote]

Yeah… maybe they dont want to spend there real money on a site? ever think of that? like i said this it to “help” them.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Why do you care? Thre are hundreds of servers out there, 90% are never up at any one time, and 80% don’t have more than 5 dedicated players. All the servers are the same.

And still, if they had a good server, the fact that they would go find real hosting can’t be denied.

Read full topic

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @xx_ch4d_xx xx_ch4d_xx
item.description:
@xx_ch4d_xx wrote:

[quote=“Budda, post:2, topic:109082”]If people had an extremely popular server, they wouldn’t need this. If it were popular, they would be willing to spend the time and money on a proper site and forums.

I realise that this is just a stunt to advertise, and I would suggest simply submitting your site to the top 100 sites and all that. Get a few friends to vote every day and after a while your site will be up there with the rest.[/quote]

No, this is NOT just a stunt to advertise… this is to help out servers…

Read full topic

item.title: Forum hosting
item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

If people had an extremely popular server, they wouldn’t need this. If it were popular, they would be willing to spend the time and money on a proper site and forums.

I realise that this is just a stunt to advertise, and I would suggest simply submitting your site to the top 100 sites and all that. Get a few friends to vote every day and after a while your site will be up there with the rest.

Read full topic
